section.title: DSPF Used for Connectivity
section.p: If the DSPF is used for connectivity purpose (the SPICE netlist is not connected without the DSPF, connectivity is ensured by the R elements), use .INCLUDE parasitics.dspf inside .SUBCKT

section.title: DSPF Used for Back-Annotation
section.p: If there is no BUSBIT construct, only identifiers containing [] or < > are considered as vectors.
